ComicInfo.Summary:
What is the secret of "The Knife?" Find out in this issue of comics' premier international anthology. Also Tardi's Roach Killer (printed in two colors), Joe Haldeman's Forever Wars, Schuiten and Peeter's The Tower, Everett Peck's Duckman, Druillet's Delirius, and Andreas' award-winning Coutoo. All this, plus another chapter of Fred and Bob by Cailleteau and Vatine, as well as works by Rick Geary and Geof Darrow. *Story Titles * Delirius:The Further Adventures of Lone Sloane Chapter 5 The Adventures of Fred & Bob: 1963 Happy New Year The Forever War Book 1 Chapter 4 Coutoo Act 4 Moving Things About The Towerpart 3: Of Elias Aureolus Palingenius, of the Young Milena and Some Mysterious Paintings The Roach Killer part 2
